titleStmt.title: Reflections upon the murder of S. Edmund-Bury Godfrey the design of Thompson, Farwell, and Paine to sham off that murder from the papists : the late endeavours to prove Stafford a martyr and no traitor, and the particular kindnesses of the Observator, and Heraclitus to the whole design, in a dialogue ; with a dedication from Mrs. Cellier.
titleStmt.author: Cellier, Elizabeth, fl. 1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A.B. and published by L. Curtiss,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
